full_sentence: Not long ago I had an incident with one of them chimping out in my yard. Treating him like a dog and commanding him, made him listen. Just think pack animals. They look for weakness and sense it. I ended up going into beserker mode and I bet he never saw that coming. When the cops came and arrested him I said 'bye bye monkey' lol. Black people suck.

full_sentence: Women are sexuality which means that they control sexuality. Before and due to religion and society norms women were much more grounded and men had more control. however now that women have so much choice with dating apps, and the so called sexual liberation, the power has shifted from men to women. men no longer have control. Women are way more promiscuous than ever before. This causes us men to resent them for not only how they behave but also what they expect from men etc etc. Why has this happened? Feminism over the years some say.
Wouldn't it be amazing if all nazis finally gathered and finished themselves off, they all need to die
don't get me wrong I don't hate jungle bunnies, but I definitely don't like them
